member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.DeviceCap.BITSPIXEL
member.summary: Number of bits per pixel

member.summary: Number of planes

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.FillMode
member.summary: FillMode - 填充模式

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.HitTestOptions
member.summary: WM_NCHITTEST and MOUSEHOOKSTRUCT Mouse Position Codes

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.HookType
member.summary: Window Hook Type

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Contants.MF_BYCOMMAND
member.summary: Indicates that uIDEnableItem gives the identifier of the menu item. If neither the MF_BYCOMMAND nor MF_BYPOSITION flag is specified, the MF_BYCOMMAND flag is the default flag.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Contants.MF_ENABLED
member.summary: Indicates that the menu item is enabled and restored from a grayed state so that it can be selected.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Contants.MF_GRAYED
member.summary: Indicates that the menu item is disabled and grayed so that it cannot be selected.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Contants.MF_DISABLED
member.summary: Indicates that the menu item is disabled, but not grayed, so it cannot be selected.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Contants.MF_BYPOSITION
member.summary: Indicates that uIDEnableItem gives the zero-based relative position of the menu item.

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Raster2Operations
member.summary: BinaryRasterOperations - 二元光栅操作

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions
member.summary: SwpOptions - 设置窗口位置选项(SetWindowPosition)

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOSIZE
member.summary: Retains current size (ignores the cx and cy members).

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOMOVE
member.summary: Retains current position (ignores the x and y members).

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOZORDER
member.summary: Retains current ordering (ignores the hwndInsertAfter member).

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOREDRAW
member.summary: Does not redraw changes.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOACTIVATE
member.summary: Does not activate the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_FRAMECHANGED
member.summary: Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed. If this flag is not specified, WM_NCCALCSIZE is sent only when the window's size is being changed.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_SHOWWINDOW
member.summary: Displays the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_HIDEWINDOW
member.summary: Hides the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOCOPYBITS
member.summary: Discards the entire contents of the client area. If this flag is not specified, the valid contents of the client area are saved and copied back into the client area after the window is sized or repositioned.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOOWNERZORDER
member.summary: Does not change the owner window's position in the Z-order.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOSENDCHANGING
member.summary: Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_DRAWFRAME
member.summary: Draws a frame (defined in the class description for the window) around the window. The window receives a WM_NCCALCSIZE message.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_NOREPOSITION
member.summary: Same as SWP_NOOWNERZORDER.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_DEFERERASE
member.summary: Prevents generation of the WM_SYNCPAINT message.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SwpOptions.SWP_ASYNCWINDOWPOS
member.summary: If the calling thread and the thread that owns the window are attached to different input queues, the system posts the request to the thread that owns the window. This prevents the calling thread from blocking its execution while other threads process the request.

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC
member.summary: WM_SYSCOMMAND . wParam The type(wParam) of system command requested. This parameter can be one of the following values.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_SIZE
member.summary: Sizes the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_MOVE
member.summary: Moves the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_MINIMIZE
member.summary: Minimizes the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_MAXIMIZE
member.summary: Maximizes the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_NEXTWINDOW
member.summary: Moves to the next window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_PREVWINDOW
member.summary: Moves to the previous window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_CLOSE
member.summary: Closes the window.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_VSCROLL
member.summary: Scrolls vertically.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_HSCROLL
member.summary: Scrolls horizontally.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_MOUSEMENU
member.summary: Retrieves the window menu as a result of a mouse click.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_KEYMENU
member.summary: Retrieves the window menu as a result of a keystroke. For more information, see the Remarks section.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_RESTORE
member.summary: Restores the window to its normal position and size.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_TASKLIST
member.summary: Activates the Start menu.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_SCREENSAVE
member.summary: Executes the screen saver application specified in the [boot] section of the System.ini file.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_HOTKEY
member.summary: Activates the window associated with the application-specified hot key. The lParam parameter identifies the window to activate.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_DEFAULT
member.summary: Selects the default item; the user double-clicked the window menu.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_MONITORPOWER
member.summary:
Sets the state of the display. This command supports devices that have power-saving features, such as a battery-powered personal computer.
The lParam parameter can have the following values: -1 (the display is powering on) 1 (the display is going to low power) 2 (the display is being shut off)

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SC_CONTEXTHELP
member.summary: Changes the cursor to a question mark with a pointer. If the user then clicks a control in the dialog box, the control receives a WM_HELP message.

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.SC.SCF_ISSECURE
member.summary: SCF_ISSECURE Indicates whether the screen saver is secure.

member.name: P:CSharpKit.Win32Api.NativeMethods.IsAppStillIdle
member.summary: 应用程序仍然闲置

member.name: M:CSharpKit.Win32Api.NativeMethods.PeekMessage(CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.MSG@,System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: The PeekMessage function dispatches incoming sent messages, checks the thread message queue for a posted message, and retrieves the message (if any exist).

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.BITMAP
member.summary: BITMAP - 定义了一个逻辑位图.的高度、宽度、颜色和格式位值

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.BITMAP.bmType
member.summary: 指定位图类型。此成员必须为 0。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.BITMAP.bmWidth
member.summary: 以像素为单位指定位图的宽度。 此宽度都必须大于 0。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.BITMAP.bmHeight
member.summary: 光栅行指定位图的高度。 该高度都必须大于 0。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.BITMAP.bmWidthBytes
member.summary: 在每光栅行指定字节数。 此值必须是偶数，因为图形设备(GDI)接口，假设位图的位值窗体整数 (2 字节) 值。 换言之， bmWidthBytes * 8 必须是下的倍数 16 大于或等于获取的值，当 bmWidth 成员乘以 bmBitsPixel 成员时。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.BITMAP.bmPlanes
member.summary: 在位图指定颜色产生的数目。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.BITMAP.bmBitsPixel
member.summary: 在必要的每帧的结束平面指定相邻颜色的位数定义像素。

member.name: T:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.MINMAXINFO
member.summary: MINMAXINFO - 包含有关窗口的最大大小的信息和位置及其最小和最大跟踪的范围。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.MINMAXINFO.ptReserved
member.summary: 保留以供内部使用

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.MINMAXINFO.ptMaxSize
member.summary: 指定该最大化的宽度 (point.x) 和 " 最大化的高度 (point.y) 窗口。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.MINMAXINFO.ptMaxPosition
member.summary: 指定最大化的窗口 (point.x) 的左边的位置和最大化的窗口 (point.y) 顶部的位置。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.MINMAXINFO.ptMinTrackSize
member.summary: 指定最低履带宽度 (point.x) 和最小跟踪的高度 (point.y) 窗口。

member.name: F:CSharpKit.Win32Api.Structs.MINMAXINFO.ptMaxTrackSize
member.summary: 指定最大履带宽度 (point.x) 和最大值跟踪的高度 (point.y) 窗口。
